summary: Defines the data model for an OpenSearch domain and implements the backend logic that mimics the AWS OpenSearch service, handling domain lifecycle operations, configuration serialization, tagging, and version queries within the Moto testing framework.
business_intent: Enable developers to test applications that interact with AWS OpenSearch without contacting real AWS services by providing a fully functional mock that supports creating, deleting, describing, configuring, and tagging OpenSearch domains and exposing supported version information.
